page.title: 16COUNTY TOWN
page.content: As the county town of{HERTFORDSHIRE, Hertford contains County Hall which is an imposing building to the south of the town centre.This is the centre of administration and employs a large proportion of local people.The County Council recently became "hung" as the conservatives lost their overall control owing to the Alliance Parties winning many seats.The town also contains the County Library which is near to County Hall.However,because the town is not by any means the largest in the County there are not many other important buildings in the centre.Only the{CASTLE HALL}offers regular entertainment-plays,films and exbititions feature there.
